CustomField.description: The last date a vendor was approved or auto-approved by finance
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK( VndLstQFin__c ),"Not Qualified" , IF(VndLstQFin__c <= (TODAY() - 365) , "Not Fresh", "Approved"))
/* NEED TO REMOVE HOTEL MOTEL TYPE AND JUST RELY ON DATE*/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The last date a vendor was approved or auto-approved by finance
CustomField.label: Finance Vendor Approved Status
